settings.text: A lightweight leave-in cream that adds moisture and smooths frizz.
A lightweight leave-in cream that adds moisture and smooths frizz.

settings.custom_liquid:
Buy it at Walmart.com

Buy it at Walmart.com

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
A lightweight leave-in cream designed to amplify moisture and smooth unruly curls. Celebrate your natural texture—from waves to coils—while taming frizz. Air-dry or use a diffuser for nourished, detangled curls.

Clean Ingredients that Work: Award-winning Hemi15 is a patented silicone alternative that locks in moisture, reduces frizz and improves definition.

Safe for: Color treated, keratin treated, chemically-treated, and relaxed hair.

Scent: Green apple blended with light floral notes of lotus blossom and honeysuckle.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content: After cleansing, use a comb to evenly distribute product through damp hair. Air-dry or use a diffuser to achieve nourished, detangled curls with definition and  movement.

settings.heading: Results
settings.content:
1. 69% reduction in frizz after 24 hours
2. Retains curls for 24 hours
3. Thermal Protection up to 450 degrees
4. 82% more glossy

*Based on a 21-day study of 35 subjects, used daily.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Clean Ingredients: 96.6% naturally derived

Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane*, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Squalane, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract**, Panthenol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Aspartic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Methyl Ionone, Limonene, Linalool

*Hemi15 (Hemisqualane)
**Flaxseed

settings.heading: Shipping and Returns
settings.content:
We’re happy to offer free standard shipping (Est. Delivery 3-5 Business Days) for all US orders $30+.

We also ship to PO Boxes (Est. Deliver 5-7 Business Days).

Free 30 day returns on all US orders.

settings.title: Our Sustainability Promise
settings.description: We’re all about health—your health and the health of the planet. Our commitment to healthy, harm-free products starts with clean formulas that are safe for our rivers and oceans. We’re also working to make our packaging as sustainable as possible. Here’s where we are now:
